snippet: He is not coming clean with voters about his career at Bain Capital, and President Obama has no reason to apologize for demanding answers.
abstract: Editorial contends that Mitt Romney has no right to complain about Pres Obama's attacks on his record at Bain Capital while he refuses to be forthcoming about the details of his departure from the firm; calls on Romney to open up documents related to his time at Bain and to release his tax returns from the period.
lead_paragraph: He is not coming clean with voters about his career at Bain Capital, and President Obama has no reason to apologize for demanding answers.
